fields.text: Welcome to Practice Fusion, home to over 112,000 connected healthcare professionals.
If you need technical support for your electronic health records, press '[INDEX]'.
For setup and installation assistance, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a setup specialist.

If you have questions about your account or billing, press '[INDEX]'.
